text: The 2019 BB&T; Atlanta Open was a professional tennis tournament to be played on hard courts. It was the 32nd edition of the tournament, and part of the 2019 ATP World Tour. It took place at Atlantic Station in Atlanta, United States between July 22 and 29, 2019. It was the first men's event of the 2019 US Open Series. == ATP singles main draw entrants == === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 !
